issues_reports.text: it's never a good sign when TWC is showing the video feed from the overpass you're hunkered down next to (at a hotel but still) scurry stuff here.
@Ask_Spectrum I have none of those cause it's not my service.

@goldammer6969 @GetSpectrum @Ask_Spectrum your internet is so bad this man here has to run a 1000ft ethernet cable down his street to his local McDonalds just to be able to play games! get your **** together

@BenjaminCook @Ask_Spectrum @GetSpectrum My only resolution was having a less bad option (which somehow AT&T Fiber qualified?!) Nearly daily 3PM outages, which was generally which I’d be either running a meeting or meeting with my manager at the time.
BRO OVERFUCKINGTIME AND MY INTERNET DISCONNECTS. **** YOUR ****** *** SERVICE @Ask_Spectrum @GetSpectrum
@GetSpectrum pay over $100 a month for a service that doesn’t work 90% of the time, worst internet provider on the planet

@Ask_Spectrum Oh, I did.  And he managed to downgrade my service and somehow still charge me what I was paying per month last year. When I asked why my new per-month payment was $50 a month _higher_ than the rate on your website, I got something about fees, taxes, etc. Disgraceful.

@AnnaIWright @HouseofCommons It is long past time the jeering, shouting and laughing was stopped, not allowed, PM questions like ALL HOC’s/HOL’s time is SERIOUS, it should never be treated like a night out at a comedians convention! The PM and his MP’s prove every time their moves move they care 0% for TWC’s
Everyone don’t get @GetSpectrum their service sucks & their customer service representatives are very unknowledgeable
@AriDrennen Get this network off my platform @Ask_Spectrum
@Ask_Spectrum  these outages are frequent. What’s tea? We pay for a service that’s interrupted daily
Day 3 of really ****** internet from @Ask_Spectrum. Confirmed with my neighbor and we still having issues. Spectrum just going to ask me to DM them.
@Ask_Spectrum Can you explain how DMing you would help? You guys use the same 10 automatic templates and never answer anything publicly
@GetSpectrum give me back my internet you slimy *****. Tired of having this **** go out left right and center. Paying for **** that I don’t even have half the time at this point.

@GetSpectrum Every ******* year your price goes up and every ******* year I have to reduce my service to get back to what I was paying originally. If there was literally any other ******* option, I'd be using it.

@Ask_Spectrum Spectrum is out once again. No Internet service for the last several days intermittently. My account number is 926944402. I pay auto payment $127.07 monthly for extremely poor service. I am at least due a credit.  AT&T is getting a lot closer
@Ask_Spectrum “Hi I’m here to return my spectrum equipment “ “spectrum just told me drop it off here” 🤓👵🏻👴🏼 **** OFF SPECTRUM
@Ask_Spectrum are there any issues in Goshen, ny? My wifi is much slower than normal and my tv is only white noise even after a reboot of the box
Spectrum has been down for like 12 hours down 😤 get it together @Ask_Spectrum
Hey @Ask_Spectrum @GetSpectrum we're in our 4th outage in the last couple of weeks. Is there any way we can escalate to avoid having these keep repeating themselves?
@Ask_Spectrum your over the phone reps are not only unprofessional but very dumb! When ******** is this power outage going to last?! You’re management team members are stupid as well
@DebraToTheLeft I was having the same thing earlier today, until I disconnected from Wi-Fi. I have had the same issue before and I have @Ask_Spectrum
@Ask_Spectrum what a total dumpster company. Every two weeks the internet is out for “planned maintenance” same tonight… this has got to stop can’t wait to cancel this **** isp
@Ask_Spectrum @ittssACE How come y’all never respond to me but the one time this foo tweets y’all respond smh .

@GetSpectrum @SpectrumA11y Holy ****** by the fine print! If you buy a brand new @samsung from Spectrum and have problems with it after 14 days they're going to tell you to go piss up a rope and try to replace it with a used one
@Ask_Spectrum A customer service representative told me there was a nationwide spectrum outage… Is that correct or was he just trying to get me off the phone?
@Ask_Spectrum hi there! I tried to reset my internet due to a work VPN issue and now my internet won’t turn back on. Help? 😫
i beg you PLEASE unless you absolutely have to... do not EVER use @GetSpectrum literally the worst company ever
